sources.title: Hair Cut-Ups (1952)
sources.description: Dangerous Dan the desperado enters the barbershop run by Hackle and Jackle with guns blazing, and that is his highlight as the Magpies use their barber equipment to teach him a lesson and drive him crazy. Watch on RetroFlix:Â  https://retroflix.org/hair-cut-ups-1952/

metadata.Plot: Dangerous Dan the desperado enters the barbershop run by Hackle and Jackle with guns blazing, and that is his highlight as the Magpies use their barber equipment to teach him a lesson and drive him crazy.
metadata.Writer: Tom Morrison, Bob Kuwahara, Paul Terry
